comment: Honestly, Professor Nettles is one of the best professors I've ever had. She is very sweet and understanding in any situation and always makes sure you are able to do your absolute best. The tests nor the quizzes are extremely hard and she is a very fair grader. I will miss having her as my professor.

very unorganized professor, did not abide by syllabus. impossible to reach outside school or via email, and give attitude when asked questions. quiz and homework heavy though no clear grading criteria as she again doesnt abide by syllabus
rating_tags: Tough grader--Group projects--Get ready to read

comment: Dr. Nettles was probably one of the best professors I have had at KSU. From the first day I could tell she really cared about her students and I loved her class so much I decided to switch my major to psychology! She's very accessible outside of class and wants to help you in your circumstances. I genuinely loved her online lectures.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: all work was through online textbook site. super easy. just complete the online work and youll get an A. is a lot of busy work though. classes were actually interesting and she's cute.
